name: Wisp
description:
Mari and her friends go exploring. but when things get spooky, she's left alone... What happens next may surprise you.

Wisp you were here... the best haunted vacation locales.

Wisp is a short point and click / visual novel game made in 2 weeks for MyFirstGameJam! We weren't able to fully finish, but we managed to make a quick game as a first glimpse, as we may go further with this project.

Following MyFirstGameJam's theme of a spin on a popular story/myth, we wanted to use Will o' Wisps and myths about them!

***Press S to progress dialogue***

The Team:

filipinapanda

rock-bomber

j2phoenix
